article.p: Hi, I am Obstructed Goggles, an Utrecht-based software developer.
I like programming and that is why I do it. My main interests lie in compiler and interpreter construction, task scheduling, and ridiculing and circlejerking about silly ideas.

I enjoy tools that give me the freedom to express my ideas, particularly D and Perl 6. My favorite text editor is Visual Studio Code. My workstation is a Dell XPS running NixOS GNU/Linux and I am a vivid Nix user.
